thread.title: China clears Nokia's Alcatel-Lucent buy
thread.title_full: China clears Nokia's Alcatel-Lucent buy | Business Spectator

author: Dow Jones newswires
title: China clears Nokia's Alcatel-Lucent buy
text:
Nokia Corp said on Monday it has received antitrust clearance from the Chinese Ministry of Commerce for its proposed Alcatel-Lucent acquisition, a clearance that completes the material antitrust review.
Nokia said it will continue to cooperate with the French government to obtain formal approval from the Ministry of Economy. After that it will proceed with the filing of the public exchange offer for Alcatel-Lucent securities. Once the offer period opens, the proposed transaction will remain subject to approval by Nokia shareholders and the successful closing of the exchange offer.
Nokia repeated it expects the acquisition to close in the first half of 2016.
